section.title: item sites master list of Item Sites
section.para: To access the master list of Item Sites in your system, select the "List Item Sites" option. The "following screen will appear:

At the top of the screen is a "Search for" field. To search for an Item Site, begin typing in the search field. As you type, the Item Site list will automatically scroll toward the Item Number you are typing. You can also search for Item Sites manually by scrolling through the list. The following views are also available:

listitem.para: Select to display a list of all Item Sites for all Sites.
Specify Site whose Item Sites you want to display.
Select to display active as well as inactive Item Sites.

section.para: To the far right of the screen, the following buttons are available:

listitem.para: Closes the screen, returning you to the application desktop.
Opens screen for creating a new Item Site, as described in .

tip.para: Mac users may use COMMAND + N to enter a new Item Site.

listitem.para: Enables you to edit highlighted Item Sites. The edit screen is the same as that for creating a new Item Site—except that when editing, the fields will contain Item Site information. Double-clicking on an Item Site will also bring you to the editing screen. Mac users may use COMMAND + E to edit an existing Item Site.
Highlight an Item Site and then select this button to reach a read-only view of the "Edit" screen.
Highlight an Item Site and then select this button to remove the Item Site from the list.
